executiveSummary: Adam and Desire Hower pitched their product 'Subsafe' on Shark Tank, seeking $50,000 for 13.3% equity. Subsafe is a waterproof, crushproof container designed to keep submarine sandwiches and other items dry. After discussing product features, pricing, and sales performance, they received and accepted a joint offer from Mark Cuban and Charles Barkley for $100,000 in exchange for 25% equity.
